term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - quality of solvent in polymer chemistry
term.title: quality of solvent

item.text: A qualitative characterization of the polymer–solvent interaction. A solution of a polymer in a 'better' solvent is characterized by a higher value of the second virial coefficient than a solution of the same polymer in a 'poorer' solvent.
